titles.title: San Juan County Settlement Implementation Act
San Juan County Settlement Implementation Act

To authorize the Secretary of the Interior to retire coal preference right lease applications for which the Secretary has made an affirmative commercial quantities determination, to substitute certain land selections of the Navajo Nation, and for other purposes.
San Juan County Settlement Implementation Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Mineral Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Indian, Insular and Alaska Native Affairs.

committee.subcommittee: Indian, Insular and Alaska Native Affairs
committee.name: House Natural Resources
